channel.description: Recent content in Webinar on Dominique Girard, Psy.D/Ph.D

item.title: Online Webinar with Dominique Girard: A meta-synthesis about the meaning of suffering in the EAS context
item.author: dominique.girard@radboudumc.nl (Dominique Girard, Psy.D/Ph.D)
item.description: I am very happy to accounce that I will be presenting (in French!) the results of my meta-synthesis about the experience of suffering in the EAS context during the next online webinar of RQSPAL.
